casebody.data:
Wilson S. Kistler et al. v. Douglas Gnazzo et al. (12114)

Foti, Lavery and Landau, Js.

Argued February 15 decision released March 22, 1994 Jeffrey J. Mirman, for the appellant (named defendant). Robert J. Cathcart, with whom, on the brief, were Gregory T. D'Auria and Keith E. Krusz, for the appellees (plaintiffs). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed. See American Trading Real Estate Properties, Inc. v. Trumbull, 215 Conn. 68, 574 A.2d 796 (1990).
